name: 9ct Gold Wedding Band
description: Beautiful 9ct gold wedding band, perfect for your special day. Durable and comfortable to wear.

name: White Gold Diamond Ring
description: Elegant white gold diamond ring with sparkling round cut diamond. This ring is perfect for a proposal or as a wedding band.

name: Sterling Silver Stone Set Tennis Bracelet
description: The bracelet features a row of sparkling stones, set in a classic and timeless design. The bracelet is adjustable and features a lobster claw clasp, ensuring a comfortable and secure fit on the wrist. Comes with a jewellery box, perfect for storage or gifting.

name: Rolex Datejust 41 Watch
description: This Rolex Datejust 41 watch is a classic timepiece that combines elegant style with precision engineering. The watch features a stainless steel case with a diameter of 41mm, a fluted bezel and a silver dial. This Rolex Datejust 41 watch is a classic timepiece that combines elegant style with precision engineering. The watch features a stainless steel case with a diameter of 41mm, a fluted bezel and a silver dial. The watch comes with box and papers.

name: Tiffany True速 Engagement Ring with a Tiffany True速 Diamond in Platinum
description: This Tiffany True速 engagement ring is a stunning and timeless piece, crafted from the finest platinum. The ring features a stunning Tiffany True速 diamond, which is cut to the brand's exacting standards for maximum brilliance and fire. The diamond is held securely in a four-prong setting, allowing light to flood through the stone from every angle. With the purchase of this ring, you'll also receive a Tiffany & Co. certificate of authenticity and care instructions.

name: Sterling Silver Amethyst & Diamond Studded Earrings
description: These sterling silver earrings are a beautiful and elegant accessory, perfect for adding a touch of color and sparkle to any outfit. The earrings feature rich purple amethysts, which are surrounded by sparkling diamonds. The stones are set in a classic stud design, The earrings come with butterfly backs, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit. Comes with a jewellery box, perfect for storage or gifting.

name: 9ct Yellow Gold Twist Hoop Earrings
description: These 9ct yellow gold hoop earrings are a stylish and elegant accessory made of 9ct yellow gold with a diameter of 20mm, which gives them a warm and rich color.

name: Tissot PRC 200 Chronograph Stainless Steel Bracelet Watch
description: This Tissot PRC 200 chronograph watch is a sporty and elegant timepiece which features a stainless steel case with a diameter of 42mm and a thickness of 12mm, a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, which protects the silver dial with black hour markers and hands, including a date function at 4 o'clock position. Water resistant to 200 meters. Fitted with a stainless steel bracelet with a folding clasp. Comes with box and papers.

name: Cartier Love Bracelet, Yellow Gold
description: The Cartier Love bracelet is a timeless and iconic design crafted from luxurious 18k yellow gold. The bracelet features a unique screw design, which symbolises eternal love and commitment. Requires a special screwdriver, which is included with the purchase of the bracelet. Comes with a Cartier box and authenticity papers.

name: Vivienne Westwood Mini Bas Relief brass and cubic zirconia pendant necklace
description: This Vivienne Westwood pendant necklace combines classic design with contemporary style. The necklace features a brass mini bas-relief pendant, which is adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia. This is suspended on an adjustable delicate brass chain, fastened with a lobster claw clasp with a total length of 16 inches. Comes with a branded gift box.
